item.title: Mindless behaviour, 23rd June
item.description:
This tunnel was blocked off for months and only last week we noticed the plastic fence was ripped off and now look. The whole thing was burnt out. This is such a hazard for our children. Can we please have updates as to what is going on with repairs.i appreciate this now adds more issues but we can't have this fenced off and unsafe for the children for another u known amount of months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rangefield Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: During the whole years no Garden waste collection, 23rd June
item.description:
We keep paying by no service has been provided. I want my money back!!! I chase the lory a few times, they just drive past, keep writing emails and reports, nothing happened. Please let me know how we can improve your service or have a full refund for the whole year. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hassop Walk, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cator Park Beckenham Bins not emptied since event in Saturday., 23rd June
